heading: Jouissance shares.
general-note: Here are entered works on legal instruments, not necessarily capital stock shares, which give owners a right in net profits or dissolution of a corporation, but not a right in management or stockholders' voting and which are known as "bon de participation," "buono di godimento," "Genusschein," "part bénéficiaire," "part de fondateur," "Partizipationsschein," etc..
